Verses: 1 idharkup Pinbu Naan Sooriyanukkukkeezhe Seyyappadum Kodumaigalaiyellaam Sindhiththuppaarththen; Idho Odukkappattavargalin Kanneeraik Kanden, Avargalaith Thetruvaarillai; Odukkugiravargal Patchaththil Belamirundhadhu, Appadiyirundhum Thetruvaarillai.
2 aadhalaal Innum Uyirodirundhu Pizhaikkiravargalaippaarkkilum Munname Kaalanchendru Mariththavargalaiye Baakkiyavaangal Endren.
3 ivviru Thiraththaarudaiya Nilaimaiyaippaarkkilum Innum Piravaadhavanudaiya Nilaimaiye Vaasi; Avan Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Seyyappadum Dhurchcheygaigalaik Kaanavillaiye.
4 manushan Padum Ellaap Prayaasamum, Payanpadum Ellaak Kiriyaiyum, Ayalaanudaiya Poraamaikku Edhuvaayirukkiradhai Naan Kanden; Idhuvum Maayaiyum, Manadhukku Sanjalamumaayirukkiradhu.
5 moodan Than Kaigalaik Kattikkondu, Than Sadhaiyaiye Thingiraan.
6 varuththaththodum Manachchanjalaththodum Irandu Kaippidiyum Niraiyakkondiruppadhaippaarkkilum, Amaichchalodu Orukaippidi Niraiyak Kondiruppadhe Nalam.
7 pinbu Naan Thirumbikkondu Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Maayaiyaana Veroru Kaariyaththaik Kanden.

8 oruvan Ondikkaaranaayirukkiraan; Avanukku Udanaaliyumillai, Avanukkup Pillaiyum Sagodharanumillai; Appadiyirundhum Avanpadum Prayaasaththukku Mudivillai; Avan Kan Aisuvariyaththaal Thirupthiyaagiradhumillai; Naan Oru Nanmaiyaiyum Anubaviyaamal Yaarukkaagap Prayaasappadugiren Endru Avan Sindhikkiradhumillai; Idhuvum Maayai, Theeraadha Thollai.
9 ondiyaayiruppadhilum Iruvar Koodiyiruppadhu Nalam; Avargaludaiya Prayaasaththinaal Avargalukku Nalla Palanundaagum.
10 oruvan Vizhundhaal Avan Udanaali Avanaith Thookkividuvaan; Ondiyaayirundhu Vizhugiravanukku Aiyo, Avanaith Thookkividath Thunaiyillaiye.
11 iranduperaaip Paduththukkondirundhaal Avargalukku Soodundaagum; Ondiyaayirukkiravanukku Soodundaavadhu Eppadi?
12 oruvanai Yaadhaamoruvan Merkolla Vandhaal Iruvarum Avanukku Edhirththunirkalaam; Muppurinool Seekkiramaai Araadhu.
13 ini Aalosanaiyaik Kelaadha Kizhavanum Moodanumaagiya Raajaavaippaarkkilum, Ezhaiyum Gnaaniyumaagiya Ilaignane Vaasi.
14 arasaala Siraichchaalaiyilirundhu Purappaduvaarumundu; Raajaangaththil Pirandhu Ezhaiyaavaarumundu.
15 sooriyanukkukkeezhe Jeevanullor Yaavarum Raajaavin Pattaththirku Varappogira Pillaiyin Patchaththil Saarndhiruppadhaik Kanden.
16 avargalukkumun Appadi Seydha Janangalin Lakkaththirku Mudivillai; Ini Iruppavargal Ivanmelum Piriyam Vaikkaamarpovaargal; Idhuvum Maayaiyum, Manadhukku Sanjalamumaayirukkiradhu.
